A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: First Star Wars movie that actually left me feeling disappointed and bum. Jokes were out of place\, pacing is off\, lots of plot holes\, missed opportunities\, and plot twist just for the sake of plot twist without any payoff. For a sequel to the Force Awakens\, this was horrible. Rian Johnson seems to only care about Rey and Kylo story and just decided to mess with everyone else. Finn storyline repeated itself\, Poe became a hothead\, & General Leia became Superman. Ugh! Cinematography was great though.  Which is where the half star came from.
